content.message: How to check an errors. Hanasa is a clinic in Jierusalem. I likes tortillini. Cats has pot
content.response: How to check an errors error. Hanasa is a clinic in Jierusalem Jerusalem. I likes like tortillini tortellini. Cats has have pot put Details: 1. an errors. Hanasa is a clinic in: errors -> error. Confusion between the singular and plural form of a noun. 2. in Jierusalem. I likes tortillini. Cats has pot: Jierusalem -> Jerusalem. A word was not spelled correctly. 3. I likes tortillini. Cats has pot: likes -> like. Mismatch between the plurality of the verb and the subject. 4. likes tortillini. Cats has pot: tortillini -> tortellini. A word was not spelled correctly. 5. Cats has pot: has -> have. Mismatch between the plurality of the verb and the subject. 6. has pot: pot -> put. Confusion between words which sound similar or have a similar spelling.
